### Open Science: Transform your house into a laboratory

::: bullet-list
-   [A university news outlet](https://biologia.uc.cl/convierte-tu-casa-en-un-laboratorio/) covered the release of our science communication book. The book has instructions to perform simple scientific experiments and their explanations. It was released for free during the COVID-19 lockdown to encourage kids to learn about science. [The book is free online](https://shorturl.at/3XgCm) (Spanish only).
:::
